item.title: Modeling (lack of) store ordering using PlusCal - and a wishlist
item.description: The Message Passing pattern (MP pattern) is shown in the snippet below (borrowed from LKMM docs). Here, P0 and P1 are 2 CPUs executing some code. P0 stores a message in buf and then signals to consumers like P1 that the message is available – by doing a store to flag. P1 reads flag and if it is set, knows that some data is available in buf and goes ahead and reads it.
